query:
ALTER TABLE agent_proofs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS policyDecision ENUM('PASS', 'FAIL'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS specHash VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS authority VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS signedAt TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS signature TEXT
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2mRYiUGqDHCaXxC.root --database Y5Wav99nvtrRC8pT5fEnKy --execute ALTER TABLE agent_proofs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS policyDecision ENUM('PASS', 'FAIL'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS specHash VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS authority VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS signedAt TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS signature TEXT
